    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Amount_Detail

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Amount_Summary
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Amount_Detail

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<AmountDetail description="Example String Value" maxQuantity="2345" percentage="10" quantity="1234" unitName="Example String Value" unitPrice="100.0000" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Total currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</Total>
    <ChargeUnit>Per unit</ChargeUnit>
</AmountDetail>

      Example JSON

      {
  "AmountDetail" : {
    "unitPrice" : 100.0000,
    "unitName" : "Example String Value",
    "quantity" : 1234,
    "percentage" : 10,
    "description" : "Example String Value",
    "maxQuantity" : 2345,
    "Total" : {
      "value" : 80000,
      "currencyCode" : "USD",
      "minorUnit" : 2
    },
    "ChargeUnit" : {
      "value" : "Per unit"
    }
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        maxQuantity
        This is used in conjunction with UnitName to specify the maximum quantity of units as defined by UnitName.
        Details
        Type NonNegativeInteger
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attributes inherited from http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Amount_Summary

        unitPrice, unitName, quantity, percentage, description

      • Alias Summary

        Aliases 
        Price_Detail
